casebody.data:
No. 11-575. Joseph P. Carson, Petitioner v. United States Office of Special Counsel. 565 U.S. 1101,132 S. Ct. 857,

181 L. Ed. 2d 563,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8952, December 12, 2011.

Motion of Lori A. Saxon, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 633 F.3d 487.
